original_title: Il turno di notte lo fanno le stelle
overview: Matteo and Sonia meet in a hospital on the eve of their respective open heart surgeries. They share a common passion for mountaineering and make a vow that if their operations succeed, they will meet in 6 months time to climb together a peak in the Italian Alps. Will their hearts survive the challenge?
title: The Nightshift Belongs to the Stars
